flavorText: Action: Show GLOWING BLUE GLYPHS being TORN out of a GRIMOIRE, leaving BLANK PAGES behind.

Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments wendest du Hellsicht 1 an.

foreignData.flavorText: 행동: 빛나는 푸른 상형문자들이 그리모어에서 떨어져 나오며 빈 페이지만을 남기는 모습을 보여주십시오.

당신의 유지단 시작에, 점술 1을 한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ação: Mostrar GLIFOS AZUIS BRILHANTES sendo ARRANCADOS de um GRIMÓRIO, deixando suas PÁGINAS EM BRANCO.
foreignData.name: Revisão Mística

Toda vez que você descarta um card, cada oponente tritura dois cards.

name: Mystic Redaction
originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
Whenever you discard a card, each opponent mills two cards.

rulings.text: If Mystic Redaction's last ability triggers during the cleanup step because you are discarding due to maximum hand size, players will be able to respond to that ability. Then, when all players have passed priority in succession with the stack empty, a new cleanup step will occur.
The ability that defines Necrogoyf's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield. If Necrogoyf is in a graveyard, that ability will count itself.

text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
Whenever you discard a card, each opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
